SDG_GOAL: Goal 9: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG_TARGET: Target 9.2:Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 9.2.2: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment
SDG_CUSTODIAN_AGENCIES:
United Nations Industrial Development Organization (UNIDO)

(with the collaboration of the International Labour Organization – ILO)
STAT_CONC_DEF:
Definition:

This indicator presents the share of manufacturing employment in total employment.
SOURCE_TYPE:
Ghana Population and Housing Census, 2010

Ghana Population and Housing Census, 2021

Ghana Living Standards Survey (GLSS) Round 7, 2017
RATIONALE: This indicator conveys the contribution of manufacturing in total employment. It measures the ability of the manufacturing sector to absorb surplus labour from agricultural and other traditional sectors.
COVERAGE: This data is disaggregated by regions, sex, rural and urban areas.
